search.title: Search
search.keywords_true_start: Search was unable to find any product results for
search.keywords_true_end: you may have typed your word incorrectly, or are being too specific. Try using a broader search phrase.
search.keyword_false: This category is empty! Please try another category or use our search function to find what you are looking for. If you require further assistance please contact us.

category.category_empty: This category is empty! Please try another category or use our search function to find what you are looking for. If you require further assistance please contact us.

product.choose_free: Today & Choose From One Of These FREE Gifts!
product.product_review_title: Be The First To Review This Product!
product.product_review_subtitle: users shop smarter by writing reviews for products you have purchased.

customer.no_email_title: You are required to enter your email address to order from our website and receive email notifications.
customer.unresolve_dispute_link: View  or close your unresolved disputes.
customer.allow_quote_approval_link: Manage and approve quotes on account
customer.edit_account_link: Change your name, phone number and more
customer.edit_address_link: Change or add your shipping address
customer.orders_link: View, print and track orders you have placed.
customer.orders_empty: No orders have been placed on this account.
customer.standing_orders_link: View or edit your recurring orders.
customer.quotes_link: View or print any outstanding quotes.
customer.quotes_empty: No quotes have been placed on this account.
customer.wishlist_link: View, create or edit your wishlist(s)
customer.wishlist_empty: You have not added a wishlist. Add a new wishlist below.
customer.warranty_link: Problems with a product or order?
customer.favourites_link: Reorder from a list of past purchases.

approve_quote_success.title: Approve Quote
approve_quote_success.subtitle: Congratulations! Quote #[@order_id@] has been approved and changed to an order. You can pay for this order now by clicking on the pay now button below.

delete_quote_success.title: Dismiss Quote
delete_quote_success.subtitle: Your quote [@order_id@] has been dismissed. No further action is required.

documents.title: My Files
documents.documents_empty: We do not have any files stored on your account.

edit_account.title: Edit Your [@config:company_name@] Account Details
edit_account.subtitle: Please complete all the required fields below before continuing.
edit_account.msg_innerHTML_zip_empty: Please enter your billing country and postal code above.
edit_account.msg_innerHTML_reg_empty: Error. Please contact our customer support: sales.com.au
edit_account.msg_innerHTML_else: Please enter your billing suburb and state below.
edit_account.dropshipping_info_subtitle: Customise the documentation we send out with your drop shipped orders.
edit_account.dropshipping_info_label_one: Drop Shipping Documentation Footer (Will be displayed on footer of packing slips, labels etc)
edit_account.dropshipping_info_help_one: (Instructions: Enter the text you would like to see on the footer of any documentation we send out to your customers. EG: Call 1300 123 567 to re-order. When you are finished click the "save changes I have made" button at the bottom of this page.)
edit_account.dropshipping_info_label_two: Dropshipping Company Logo (Will be displayed on header of packing slips, labels etc)
edit_account.dropshipping_info_help_two: (Instructions: Click browse to search your local computer for your company logo. Your logo should be in .JPG or .GIF format. When you are finished click the "save changes I have made" button at the bottom of this page.)

edit_address.title: Add or Edit Address Book Entry
edit_address.help_block: You can use the Address Book tool to create and save multiple ship-to addresses. You can then choose your appropriate address for each order you place at checkout.
edit_address.shipping_lead: Add a new address or edit an existing address
edit_address.msg_innerHTML_not_selectedcountry: Please enter your city and state below.
edit_address.msg_innerHTML_zip_empty: Please enter your postal code above.
edit_address.msg_innerHTML_not_httpReq: Error. Please contact our customer support: [@config:COMPANY_EMAIL@]
edit_address.confirm_delete: Do you want to delete this address book entry?

done.title: Password Changed
done.paragraph: Your password has been changed, and a confirmation email has been sent to [@EMAIL@]
done.account_btn: Continue To My Account Home Page

template.title: Change Account Password
template.paragraph: Please enter your current and new password below in order to change your password.

favourites.title: Reorder Your Favourite Items
favourites.paragraph: Thanks for checking back [@bill_first_name@]. We've made it even easier for you to order from us.  Use this quick list to access all the items you have purchased from us in the past for quick reordering!
favourites.favourites_empty: It appears that you have not purchased from this website before. Once you have made some purchases from this website, come back to this page for a quick listing of all your past purchases for easy reordering!

done.title: Password Sent To [@EMAIL@]
done.paragraph_one: For security reasons a new account password has been generated and sent to [@EMAIL@].
done.paragraph_two: You can reset your password to something you remember the next time you login.

template.title: Forgot Password?
template.forgotpwd_paragraph: Please enter your e-mail address and we will send you a new password by e-mail.

done.title: Username Send To [@EMAIL@]
done.paragraph: Your username has been sent to [@EMAIL@].

template.title: Forgotten username?
template.help: Please enter your e-mail address below and we will send you your username by e-mail.

template.title: Manage Logo's
template.paragraph: Sorry, you need to be logged in to manage your logo's. Either login, or create an account.

view.title: Manage Logo
view.upld_logo_help:
We accept GIF, JPG and PNG formats.
Maximum file size is 5MB.

edit.title: Edit My Store
edit.geo_getloc_btn: Get the Latitude and Longitude for the above address
edit.images_paragraph: Store Logos will be re-sized and thumbnails will be created automatically. Uploaded images should not exceed 500kb in size.

template.title: My Stores
template.paragraph: Sorry, the page you are looking for cannot be found. If you require further assistance please contact customer service.

template.alert: Sorry, the order you are looking for cannot be found. If you require further assistance please contact customer service.
template.title: Retrieve Order Tracking Information
template.paragraph: For security reasons please enter some details related to your order so that we can provide tracking information.

template.id_empty: Sorry, the order you are looking for cannot be found. If you require further assistance please contact customer service.
template.title: Retrieve Order Details

pay_now_confirm.title: Pay Now
pay_now_confirm.amount_paid: Enter Amount You Want To Pay Now
pay_now_confirm.processing:
Payment Processing.
Please do not refresh or close this page.

pay_now_success.title: Thank You!
pay_now_success.paragraph: Your payment order has been processed.

payrec.title: Pay Outstanding Orders & Invoices
payrec.processing_heading_two: Please do not refresh or close this page
payrec.real_time_help: Enter your payment details and the amount you want to pay below. Then apply the payment to the invoices you want to pay until your Out Of Balance equals 0. To finalise payment click on the process payment button at the bottom of the page.
payrec.orders_empty: No outstanding orders on this account.

done.title: Account Password Changed
done.paragraph: Your password has been changed, and a confirmation email has been sent to [@EMAIL@].
done.account_btn: Continue To My Account Home Page

template.title: Create Account Password
template.paragraph: So that you can shop faster in the future, print and track past orders, please create an account password below.

logout.title: Logged Out -
logout.subtitle: You have been successfully logged out of your account.

cart.title: Shopping Cart
cart.gifts_available_title: Congratulations! The above purchase has made you eligible for [@gifts_available@] of the following FREE Gifts!
cart.gifts_available_help: You can add any of the following gifts to your shopping Shopping Cart now and you will not be charged for them!
cart.calc_shipping_subtitle: Enter your post code to calculate.
cart.discount_code_subtitle: If you have a coupon or discount code enter it below
cart.empty_post_code: Enter post code to calculate shipping

checkout.title: Secure Checkout
checkout.alert_processor_account_title: Important! Your order is not yet complete.
checkout.alert_processor_account_subtitle: Please confirm your billing and shipping details below and click the  "Confirm & Process Order" button at the bottom of this page to complete your purchase.

shipping_details.title: Shipping Details
shipping_details.customer_po_help: Enter your purchase order number above<

payment_details.title: Payment Details
payment_details.ccv_explanation: the card security code is the last 3 digit number located on the BACK of your card on or above your signature line. For an American Express card, it is the 4 digits on the FRONT above the end of your card number.
payment_details.cheque_end: to will be provided after you confirm your order below.
payment_details.bank: Our bank details will be provided after you confirm your order below.
payment_details.bpay: When you submit this page, you will be given a Bpay biller code and a reference number. Please quote the numbers and call your participating financial institution to make a payment from your cheque, savings or credit card account.
payment_details.paypal_payer_true: When you submit this page, you will be redirected to the PayPal website to continue your PayPal Express Checkout.
payment_details.paypal_payer_false: When you submit this page, your paypal account or credit card will be debited.
payment_details.account_start: account will automatically be charged for the value of this order.
payment_details.other: Our bank details will be provided after you confirm your order below.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.subtitle: The page you were looking for doesn't appear to exist or has moved.
